articles.title: Russian 'kamikaze' drones hit Kyiv as Putin heads for Belarus - Reuters
articles.description: Moscow launched a "kamikaze" drone attack on Monday, hitting key infrastructure in and around Kyiv, hours before Russian President Vladimir Putin arrived in Belarus, fu…
articles.content: KYIV, Dec 19 (Reuters) - Moscow launched a "kamikaze" drone attack on Monday, hitting key infrastructure in and around Kyiv, hours before Russian President Vladimir Putin arrived in Belarus, fuelling… [+5826 chars]
